duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide friendly and knowledgeable customer service to Beauty Enthusiasts, recommending products and services to meet their needs.
Maintain store cleanliness, organization, and product availability to ensure a positive shopping experience for guests.
Handle sales, refunds, and exchanges while promoting loyalty and guest service programs.
Participate in inventory management, receipt of shipment, and execution of merchandise displays.
Stay informed about new and existing products to better serve guests and contribute to sales growth.
